Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Mutation A464V was not found in 18 unrelated MLD patients and 50 controls .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| MLD (Mucopolysaccharidosis type IVA or Morquio A disease) |

Explanation:

MLD (Mucopolysaccharidosis type IVA or Morquio A disease) is the only disease-related term in the paragraph. It is mentioned as "MLD patients".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| MLD |

Explanation:

MLD is the only term that can be considered as a disease entity in the paragraph. It is mentioned as "MLD patients". Although it is an abbreviation, it is a well-known disease abbreviation in the medical field, which stands for Mucopolysaccharidosis type IVA or Morquio A disease.
